name: rabbit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a small animal with long ears and large front teeth that moves by jumping on its long back legs, or the meat of this animal eaten as food: a pet rabbit rabbit stew Synonym
bunny child's word
Gary Ombler/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe rabbit hopped across the grass.He waved his magic wand and a rabbit appeared.He strolled through the fields, potting (at) the occasional rabbit.She stroked the rabbit's soft fur.They have several pets - a dog, two rabbits and a guinea pig.
